meanings.sent1: The blanket is nonflammable, so it won't catch fire easily.
meanings.sent2: It is important to use nonflammable materials in a fireworks factory.
meanings.sent3: The nonflammable curtains saved the day when the kitchen caught fire.
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor was like a nonflammable shield against his fiery temper.
meanings.sent5: The nonflammable coating on the walls made the room feel safe and secure.

meanings.definition: Not capable of being easily ignited or set on fire.
meanings.sent1: The nonflammable chemicals are stored in a special cabinet.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter wore a nonflammable suit to protect himself from the flames.
meanings.sent3: The nonflammable paper airplane flew gracefully through the air.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a nonflammable barrier, impossible to ignite with anger.
meanings.sent5: The nonflammable building materials ensured the safety of the occupants during the fire drill.
